newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai cabinet to decide on zero-coupon bond issue.
newsitem.headline: Thai cabinet to decide on zero-coupon bond issue.

text.p: Thailand's cabinet is expected to approve a total zero-coupon bond issue of 50 billion baht on Tuesday, Bank of Thailand governor Rerngchai Marakanond said on Monday.
But the actual issue will be divided into tranches with the first lot of 500 million baht expected to be launched later in the week, he said.
The bonds are being planned by the authorities to raise funds to help cash-strapped firms in the currently depressed property sector. MORE ak/ram
